topic.title: Types Of Companies Which Would Benefit from the DITA XML Standard

body.p: I would divide in general the companies which benefit from using DITA XML for their technical documentation needs in three large sections:

dd.p: These companies create real-world objects, be them cars, refrigerators or computer chips. Each version of each product has an unique product ID and needs to be documented. Different products are sometimes similar in functionality but they also have some differences.

These companies provide software components which are version-ed and usually get installed on the client's side. As each client may have an older version of the product, user manuals for older versions need to be made available.
These companies usually provide cloud based services, the end user receives always access to the latest stable release, there is no user manual made available for past releases.
